skills.name: Embrace the World
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 25s] Fire rocket fists forward to deal 200% ATK of Physical DMG, which then smash into the ground to deal 100% ATK of Physical DMG. The fists will keep spinning on the ground to pull in enemies and deal 20x25.0% ATK of Physical DMG over 8s. When the weapon is equipped by Sweet 'n' Spicy, cast ground Charged ATK III or Aerial Charged ATK II while the fists are spinning to recover them, after which the spinning DMG becomes part of Charged ATK, and the current Charged ATK cast deals 45.0% bonus Physical DMG. Sweet 'n' Spicy can only recover fists launched by herself.

skills.name: Loosen Up
skills.description: Charged ATK and Ultimate deal 40.0% bonus DMG to shields. Ultimate boosts team Physical DMG by 35.0% for 15s. Triggering it again resets the duration. Unique effect.
